name: COUCH VERSUS
description: Unique 2Players versus game where one player controls the HERO and one player controls the portals to spawn MONSTERS in real-time. Combine multiple MONSTERS with different abilities, Devise plans to corner the HERO, and seize victory or be the HERO and survive the onslaught of MONSTERS.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 GHz Intel or AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 200 MB available space
